page.shortlink: grid component client side onrowstatechange event
page.description: Fires when the state of a Grid row has changed. Possible states are 'view', 'change', and 'enter'.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: mode
property.description: The record's state. Possible values are:

property.name: isDirty
property.description: Indicates whether or not any edits have been made to the record. If isDirty is true, the record has unsaved changes.

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
